text: Fra' Ludwig Hoffmann von Rumerstein (born January 21, 1937) is an Austrian nobility. He was the interim Prince and Grand Master of the Sovereign Military Order of Malta in 2017. From 1994 to 2004 and again from 2014 to 2019, he was Grand Commander of the Sovereign Military Order of Malta. He was born in Innsbruck.Grand Commander ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Princes and Grand Masters of the Sovereign Military Order of Malta Category:Austrian nobility
title: Ludwig Hoffmann-Rumerstein
